file_content.text: Thank you for your help.
I'm sorry. I just couldn't face them--not after what I've done.
Thanks for your help!
Stay back, Republic scum. Stay back or I'll shoot!
Calm down. You don't happen to know Paul, do you?
I'm looking for Paul.
I don't want a fight. I was hired by a couple to find their son, Paul. Do you know him?
Maybe you can help me.
No one here by that name. No one here with parents. The separatists are our family, and war is our mother.
Show me where Paul is or I'll kill you!
Don't push me.
I don't know anyone of that name.
I am Bonecrusher, and my men are loyal to the death. We eat Republic lackeys like you for dinner. So stay back unless you want to become our next meal!
Are you sure you don't know Paul?
Come on, now.
That's funny. You look just like your mother described.
Your mom sent me.
Shut up. Shut up. Shut up!
I don't want to fight you. But if you're Paul or you know him, I might be able to help you.
No need for violence.
That's--not--my--name!
I'll kill you. I'll kill you. I'll rip you to... uh... no! No... no more! No more killing. No more blood.
Please, I--I'm sorry. I'm Paul. I'm the one you're looking for. Please, don't... don't... don't kill me.
Please explain.
Your parents are worried sick about you.
You need to go back.
I'm sorry. They want us to forget who we are, where we came from.
Why shouldn't I, separatist scum?
Why not?
Please, it's... it's the stims. The separatists pump us full of this stuff, and we stop thinking. We just want to kill everything.
I never wanted to join the separatists. I didn't have a choice. Please don't hurt me. I'm sorry.
You didn't have a choice?
I'm sorry.
Please don't pity me. I'm too terrible for pity.
You'd better be sorry.
Watch yourself.
I am, I am. I--I told you--I didn't have a choice.
We were taken years ago, fifteen of us. I was thirteen; the others were younger. The separatists gave us stims and blasters and told us to kill.
We couldn't resist. They would have killed us. So we took the stims, and--and we didn't have to think... we could just shoot and....
You don't have to say anymore.
It's alright.
Thank you.
You're a good fighter. I can't imagine it'd be that hard to escape.
Couldn't you just run?
Where would I run to?
You're free to go now, Paul.
Relax. It's over.
I thought about running but didn't have anywhere to go. It costs a lot of money to get off-planet, and the separatists don't pay us.
I can't go back to my family. How could I face them after all I've done?
I'm sure there's a place in the Republic army for you.
The Republic needs soldiers.
I don't want to fight anymore! I just need to get someplace where I can start over.
You can't fight for the separatists the rest of your life.
You can't stay here.
I know, but I can't go back to my family. I can't face them.
I'm sure they'd forgive you.
Your parents love you.
I couldn't forgive myself. Maybe someday I could go back--but I can't stay on this planet, in this war.
You'd be better off leaving Ord Mantell.
You're right.
If I just had a few credits, I could leave this damn planet. I could start over. Please, can you help me?
I hope this is enough to get you off-planet. I don't know how else to help you.
Have these credits.
It's--it's plenty. But you're--you're giving me credits? I--I don't know what to say. I can finally leave. Thank you.
Take this--so my mother will know I'm okay. Tell my parents I've escaped Ord Mantell.
Of course.
Thank you.
You can't let your family go on worrying about where you are.
No, you need to go back.
Maybe I'll write to them once I'm off-planet--but I can't face them right now. I'm sorry.
I'll send them the bill for those credits I just loaned you as well.
Believe me, we'll talk.
Please don't give them trouble on my account.
Thank you again for the credits. I'm going to wait until the stims wear off--until I'm sure I won't hurt anyone. Then I'll make my break for it.
You've saved my life--I owe you everything.
You need to go back to your family.
Return home. I insist.
I can't do that. I'm sorry.
But can I ask one favor--could you please tell my parents that I'm dead? I think it's better that way.
I'll do it.
Thank you.
I won't lie to your parents.
No, I can't do that.
Please. I can't bear the thought of them knowing what I've become. It'll give their hearts some peace if they can just let go.
Are you sure you won't go back to them?
Please, go to them.
Yes, I'm sure.
I'm Bonecrusher! Nothing can stop me!
